website_summaries.verdict: The Honor 20 is a good midrange Android phone, but it's not a strong enough contender to knock the Google Pixel 3a from its pedestal.

customer_reviews.title: Prepare for your Privacy to not exist!
customer_reviews.text: I can't rate this highly, not sure what it is but there are ads on certain applications that are inbuilt into the phone, and the privacy intrusion is ridiculous. Had the phone for a few hours and decided to return, thankfully Amazon have a great policy. Bought this for a gift and never been so disappointed for the person I bought it for. Have a Samsung S10+ myself and would rather pay a premium as it really makes a difference. The phone itself looks nice, the fingerprint reader is the fastest I've ever used, but massively let down by "Honor" and the "Magic" software.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Extremely satisfied
customer_reviews.text: This phone is amazing, I am extremely satisfied and glad I switched from an iPhone to this phone. Plus it comes with an exclusive fortnite skin.
customer_reviews.author: Alexis

customer_reviews.title: Super fast finger print reader and excellent value
customer_reviews.text: I'm amazed with this phone. After doing an enormous amount of research for a replacement to my broken pixel 3XL, I settled in the honor 20. I wanted a low cost phone that was nice to use and had a great screen. Best things about this phone are the amazing finger print reader which is just unbelievably fast and reliable and the very strong battery life. The screen is a better size than the pixel 3xl also with it being slimmer but longer. For the price it's excellent value and after a lifetime of buying iphones and recently Google pixels I don't think I'll go back to either brand after seeing what such little money can buy.
customer_reviews.author: Rubeen

customer_reviews.title: Worth a try!
customer_reviews.text: If your used to using Huawei / honor phones you'll know, I have a p30 and I can say this Honor 20 is similar price wise a little different, impressed by the speed of the phone as well as the camera. Good mid range phone I would say for 2020!
customer_reviews.author: MrTech_Youtuber

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant overall!
customer_reviews.text: Overall, a smashing phone, and really has the perks that is advertised. Only thing though is the overexaggeration regarding the camera. Not saying at all it's not great, but it still takes the same quality photos as any other Huawei device. I think this was a tiny bit mislead. However, the stamina and process of the phone is near exceptional and the price for it is a bargain considering the quality of the device. A solid 9/10!! Thanks amazon! 😊👍
customer_reviews.author: Joshua Nye

customer_reviews.title: Almost perfect!!
customer_reviews.text: Excellent device!! Screen is highly responsive, and the 48MP rear camera is exponential. The depth sensor camera is clear, and although its only a 2MP camera, photos are clear, and sharp. The display is better than I thought, although an AMOLED screen would have been better, its still a great device for the price. Only on complaint that I've noticed recently, the charger that came with the device is not a super fast charger. Not sure if this is normal for devices like this, but I was a bit annoyed I didn't get the right plug.
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Booooooom!!!
customer_reviews.text: Just wow everything about this phone is just completely amazing the colour the screen and texture like wow again it does what it says and more like my self i have two of these phones and they never fail me always great to use just looks and sounds as well guys the speakers on this are amazing watching films is great big screen nothing in the way and then my favourite bit the 40mpc im not gonna tell you but WTF...ECT just blows your mind go and get one and try it out
customer_reviews.author: Callum

customer_reviews.title: Took a chance and it paid off
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my son. He loves it so that's all that counts.
customer_reviews.author: ADM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent value for money and quality excellent
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to set up and transfer contacts etc. Very attractive phone.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely in love with this. So happy with my purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Gemma

customer_reviews.title: Good phone
customer_reviews.text: Great phone for the money . It was my first Android phone so was a little frustrating to learn how to use some of the menus , but after finding out how to use it i have no complains about this phone in any way .
customer_reviews.author: Dac

customer_reviews.title: Wrong plug
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic phone with a great camera. Only downside is they sent the wrong plug with it.
customer_reviews.author: robert mccarthy

customer_reviews.title: Pretty decent phone for price.
customer_reviews.text: Great camera and battery. Fingerprint reader temperamental but unlocks eventually.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: fantastic
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant phone i had been looking for a new phone for a while and the wait was worth it excellent phone
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Camera is insane for a phone!
customer_reviews.text: Camera is insane for a phone! Super quick and easy to use and set up
customer_reviews.author: Lewis wilson

customer_reviews.title: Just brilliant
customer_reviews.text: Just brilliant, got this to replace a Mate 20 Lite (which I dropped from a second floor and killed) and the difference is just astounding.....and for £295 I could not pass it up. Everything about the Honor 20 from the finish to display to the speed of operation to the cameras is leaps and bounds above my old Mate 20 Lite Haven't tried face recognition as the fingerprint reader is lightning fast I highly recommend this phone....it's the best bit of kit I've had....only I wish it had was a micro SD slot but hey, you can't have everything
customer_reviews.author: brad hayes

customer_reviews.title: Good Phone
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this phone and received this almost 2 weeks late, shipping to united states isn't great. However the phone is great but one concern is that when i choose my location as united states it would limit some of the stuff that are Huawei made. Like the honor store or huawei app. But everything else is great
customer_reviews.author: Huma

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone wife loves it
customer_reviews.text: Wife loves it and such an improvement on my honor 10 amazing spec for the money
customer_reviews.author: Simon6467

customer_reviews.title: Is this sim free
customer_reviews.text: Great product so easy to transfer details from old phone to new one.
customer_reviews.author: Madscientist

customer_reviews.title: Amazing phone
customer_reviews.text: I didn't get the phone off amazon but writing a review as I read the reviews here to help make a decision to get this phone. This phone in one word is AMAZING, most people start off with how great the camera is, it truly is but for me it's very easy to use, display is great and in a 8 hour period using it to listen to music and play games it only dropped 11% battery. Great price phone that can do what other, more expensive smartphones can do
customer_reviews.author: Stu.H

product_meta.title: HONOR 20 Dual SIM Smartphone, 6.26 Inch Display, 48 MP AI Quad Camera, 6GB RAM + 128 GB storage, Side Fingerprint,Sapphire Blue, UK Official Version
product_meta.description:
Style Name:Honor 20| Colour Name:BlueHONOR 20 is the best-in-class quad camera smartphone that allows users to capture wonders in their hands. It is driven by AI and, therefore, provides superior performance. Showcasing HONOR’s expertise in creating light-inspired designs, the new phone combines a fresh, holographic look with a smooth hand feel. HONOR 20 redefines what it means for a smartphone to set trends. It combines the latest technology with unique style, and boosts creativity with its strong capabilities.

BOX CONTAINS


1 x Phone

1 x Charger
feature_bullets: Get creative with four different lenses (Main Camera, Super Wide Angle Camera, Depth Assist Camera, Macro Camera) and shoot a subject from various distances. There is no need for additional lenses, you can just capture amazing moments without wasting any time
The 32MP selfie camera offers extremely high definition so you can capture more details, even in low-light situations. This also means more quality for your selfies

The design unites multi-dimensional appeal with topnotch tech. The 2.5D glass back panel offers an excellent grip. The All-View Display features a 91.76% screen-to-body ratio thanks to the ultra-small in-screen camera. Its opening diameter measures only 4.5mm. That's the smallest in the industry!

The 7nm Kirin 980 AI chipset with Dual-NPU ensures extra-high performance, GPU Turbo 3.0 enhances the gaming experience, and 22.5W HONOR SuperCharge powers up the battery faster to match your dynamic lifestyle
AI Dual Frequency GPS offers great accuracy. Enjoy the optimal audio experience thanks to Virtual 9.1 Surround Sound, and experience the stylish interface of Magic UI 2.1 including AI capabilities

specifications.Delivery information:: We cannot deliver certain products outside mainland UK ( ). We will only be able to confirm if this product can be delivered to your chosen address when you enter your delivery address at checkout.
